connector.description: Receive data from Kafka topics on an insecure broker combined with Apicurio Registry.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.autoCommitEnable
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: If true, periodically commit to ZooKeeper the offset of messages already fetched by the consumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.allowManualCommit
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Whether to allow doing manual commits

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.pollOnError
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: What to do if kafka threw an exception while polling for new messages. There are 5 enums and the value can be one of DISCARD, ERROR_HANDLER, RECONNECT, RETRY, STOP

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.autoOffsetReset
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: What to do when there is no initial offset. There are 3 enums and the value can be one of latest, earliest, none

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.consumerGroup
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: A string that uniquely identifies the group of consumers to which this source belongs Example: my-group-id

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.deserializeHeaders
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: When enabled the Kamelet source will deserialize all message headers to String representation.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.valueDeserializer
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Deserializer class for value that implements the Deserializer interface.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.avroDatumProvider
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: How to read data with Avro

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-source.topicIsPattern
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Whether the topic is a pattern (regular expression). This can be used to subscribe to dynamic number of topics matching the pattern.
